sentences.sContent: Another thing you can do is save the worksheet and send it to somebody else.
sentences.sContent_eng: Another thing you can do is save the worksheet and send it to somebody else.
sentences.sCn: 您可以做的另一件事情是保存工作表并将其发送给其他人。

sentences.sContent: If you do this to each worksheet item your test case script looks similar to Listing 6.
sentences.sContent_eng: If you do this to each worksheet item your test case script looks similar to Listing 6.
sentences.sCn: 如果您对每个工作表条目这样做，您的测试脚本看起来类似于列表6。

sentences.sContent: You can manipulate the worksheet by adding columns and rows, including data from other sources, creating formulas for computations, and so on.
sentences.sContent_eng: You can manipulate the worksheet by adding columns and rows, including data from other sources, creating formulas for computations, and so on.
sentences.sCn: 您可以通过添加列和行、包括其他来源的数据、创建用于计算的公式等，从而操作工作表。
